7 October 2015

More Coding In Delphi in More Formats

by Jim McKeeth

For everyone who updated to Delphi or RAD Studio 10 Seattle, you get a free copy of Nick Hodges new book More Coding in Delphi (At least if you update before the special offer runs out.) Just yesterday this was updated to include the book in ePub and Mobi format, in addition to the PDF version. This is great if you have a Kindle (Mobi) or other eReader (ePub) since these formats are more flexible.

So Upgrade to RAD Studio 10 Seattle today and download More Coding in Delphi by Nick Hodges and load it on your favorite eReader. Then buy a print copy too, because those are easier to get autographed.
